metadata.title: CVE-2018-11416 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: jpegoptim.c in jpegoptim 1.4.5 (fixed in 1.4.6) has an invalid use ofrealloc() and free(), which allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: jpegoptim package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
